original_text: They also feared the Lord and appointed from among themselves all sorts of people as priests of the high places, who sacrificed for them in the shrines of the high places.
korean_text: 그들이 또 여호와를 경외하여 자기 중에서 사람을 산당의 제사장으로 택하여 그 산당들에서 자기를 위하여 제사를 드리게 하니라

sentences.original_text: and appointed from among themselves all sorts of people
as priests of the high places

sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들을 위하여 제사를 드리는 자들이라

sentences.original_text: in the shrines of the high places
